title: What is ubiquitous computing? Are IoT and ubiquitous computing synonymous? - Quora

response.answer_text: Ubiquitous - existing or being present everywhere. Ubiquitous computing is actually achieved with mobile electronic devices. It's like computing on the go or computing with any device at any time and at any place. Sensors play an important role in Ubiquitous computing. Mobile devices, wireless communication & networking technology, voice recognition, Sensors, and Artificial Intelligence, etc. have made Ubiquitous computing possible. IoT - Internet of things IoT is a system of interrelated computing devices with unique identifiers that has the ability to transfer data over a network without human intervention. With IoT, electronics around us can be automated, mostly those that we use on a day-to-day basis.
